Ouch...

::Liono::

Liono grunts as the shot goes through his torso, emerging out of his 
back but not hitting any major systems. He reaches up with his arms 
and opens his chest plate, a blast of pure energy erupting from it 
and smashing into Motormaster. After the blast is through, Liono 
closes his chest plate, one of his hands covering the hole right 
below his chest.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> No you didnt dont worry about it, I can barely rmember as he never 
used it
> in the show. It shoots a high-energy beam of protons that can shred 
all but
> the densest materials. It dosent have to shred the robot, apart, as 
that
> would result in death, it can just rip him up a bit, or push him 
around. I
> fired it at Liono, point blank.
